item.title: Natural World - S35E08 [ 2015 ] [ MKV | x264 | HDTV | 720p | Scene ] [ Uploader: deltron ] [ Natural.World.S35E08.Irelands.Wild.River.The.Mighty.Shannon.720p.HDTV.x264-C4TV ]
item.description:
Episode Name:
Season: 35
Episode: 8
Aired: 2015-07-17

Episode Overview:

Running through the heart of Ireland, the Shannon is the longest river in the British Isles. For locally born naturalist and cameraman Colin Stafford-Johnson, it is also the wildest. Amongst the river's cast are kingfishers and predatory pike, and living on its banks are native red squirrels. On a seasonal journey in his faithful canoe, Colin paddles along the Shannon to reveal its wild treasures.
item.dc:creator: deltron

item.description:
Episode Name: Digestivo
Season: 3
Episode: 7
Aired: 2015-07-18

Episode Overview:
Captured in Italy by police on Mason Verger's payroll, Will Graham and Hannibal Lecter are delivered to Muskrat Farm to await Mason's revenge. Alana, distressed that Will has been endangered along with Hannibal, plots a rescue. And Hannibal, once again in contact with his old patient Margot, finds it irresistible to remind her that Mason will never make good on his promises. Meanwhile, Jack informs Chiyoh of Hannibal's location.

Episode Image
[img=https://cdn2.broadcasthe.net/tvdb/banners/episodes/259063/5010019.jpg]

item.description:
Episode Name: Episode Six
Season: 1
Episode: 6
Aired: 2015-07-17

Episode Overview:
Chemical hypnosis and the ship's neural link are used to explore the memories secreted away in Five's subconscious, during which she uncovers the dark truth about Four and Six's violent pasts. She also learns about the circumstances that landed her on the ship and gains some insight into the idyllic childhood of a mysterious little boy.
